scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail 'cd client && npm run dev' 'cd server && npm run start:dev'
scripts.build: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail 'cd client && npm run build' 'cd server && npm run build'
scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail 'cd client && npm run start' 'cd server && npm run start'
